nodes.text: Dannik Malaan was a male Zabrak that lived during the Galactic Civil War. He was an employee for the Corporate Sector Authority and lived in Coronet on the planet Corellia.

Dannik Malaan appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
